```{r}
pacman::p_load(rvest, tidyverse)
```

```{r}
url <- "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_shopping_malls_in_Singapore"
page <- read_html(url)

mall_names <- page %>%
  html_nodes("div.mw-parser-output ul li") %>%
  html_text() %>%
  trimws()

mall_names <- mall_names[nchar(mall_names) > 0]

mall_df <- data.frame(Mall_Name = mall_names) %>%
  arrange(Mall_Name) %>%
  filter(!Mall_Name %in% c("v", "t", "e")) %>%
  unique()

mall_df

write_csv(mall_df, "data/rawdata/singapore_malls.csv")
```
